product_name: REI Flip-Top Vacuum Tumbler - 15 fl. oz
long_description: The REI Flip-Top vacuum tumbler is an essential for cold-weather adventures. Made of premium stainless steel, the vacuum tumbler will keep your drink nice and warm while you head out and play. Tumbler keeps drinks warm for up to 6 hrs.; for best results, preheat tumbler with hot water before filling with your beverage; also keeps drinks cool for up to 10 hrs. Double-wall vacuum construction is made with premium stainless steel that is BPA free. Easy-access flip top and a push-button thermal stopper let you grab a quick drink while on the go. Food-grade plastic sipping collar is shaped so liquids flow easily from mug to mouth. Rubber on the base keeps the mug from slipping. Hand wash; do not microwave.
short_description: The REI Flip-Top vacuum tumbler is an essential for cold-weather adventures. Made of premium stainless steel, the vacuum tumbler will keep your drink nice and warm while you head out and play.
